p: The degree of roughness varies with scale. Surface roughness data can be analyzed in time and frequency domain for estimating the scaling exponentsÂ [7], [8], the parameters that describe the dynamics of the underlying process at multiple spatial and temporal scales. This work investigates the morphological complexity of virions from fractal scaling of the surface roughness of the novel corona virus SARS-nCoV (hereafter referred to as nCoV), within the scope of biophysics.
